metadata.title: CVE-2020-13164 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: In Wireshark 3.2.0 to 3.2.3, 3.0.0 to 3.0.10, and 2.6.0 to 2.6.16, the NFS dissector could crash. This was addressed in epan/dissectors/packet-nfs.c by preventing excessive recursion, such as for a cycle in the directory graph on a filesystem.

criterions.comment: wireshark package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.2.4-1').
